config.block_properties.rotation_state.t: The rotation state of the block.
config.block_properties.has_collision.to: If the block has the collision box.
config.block_properties.can_occlude.tool: If the block can occlude other blocks.
config.block_properties.dynamic_shape.to: If the block has a dynamic shape.
If the block can be ignited by lava.
config.block_properties.is_air.tooltip: If the block can be regarded as an air block.
config.block_properties.is_suffocating.t: If the block can suffocate entities.
config.block_properties.emissive.tooltip: If the block is emissive rendering.
config.block_properties.friction.tooltip: Determines how much velocity is maintained while moving on top of this block
config.block_properties.speed_factor.too: Determines how much velocity is maintained while moving on top of this block
config.block_properties.jump_factor.tool: Determines how high the player will jump when on top of this block
config.block_properties.destroy_time.too: How long it takes to break the block.
config.block_properties.explosion_resist: How resistant the block is to explosions.
config.block_properties.sound.tooltip: The sound played when the block is broken.
config.block_properties.use_ao.tooltip: Whether render the block with Ambient Occlusion.
config.item_properties.max_stack_size.to: The maximum stack size of the item.
config.item_properties.use_block_light.t: Allows control of the lighting when rendering a model in a GUI.
True - the model will be lit from the side, like a block.
False - the model will be lit from the front, like an item.
config.item_properties.is_gui_3d.tooltip: Whether render the item in GUI as a 3D model.
Enable - set a separated renderer for item.
Disable - use the renderer of root state machine instead.
config.machine_state.renderer.tooltip.0: Enable - set a separated renderer for this machine state.
config.machine_state.renderer.tooltip.1: Disable - use the renderer of root state machine instead.
config.machine_state.shape.tooltip.0: shape is consist of cubes, make sure the shape radius is no more than 2 blocks (minecraft rule).
config.machine_state.shape.tooltip.1: Enable - set a separated shape for this machine state.
config.machine_state.shape.tooltip.2: Disable - use the shape of root state machine instead.
config.machine_state.shape.tooltip.3: §4Note:§r Setting a separated shape have to set the §cdynamic shape§r to true in the block properties as well.
config.machine_state.light.tooltip.0: Enable - set a separated emissive light for this machine state.
config.machine_state.light.tooltip.1: Disable - use the light of root state machine instead.
config.definition.id.tooltip: The unique identifier of the definition.
